minor_health_potion.name: Minor Health Potion
minor_health_potion.description: A small vial of red liquid that restores a modest amount of health when consumed.
minor_health_potion.effect_description: The potion tastes bitter but you feel your wounds begin to heal.

major_health_potion.name: Major Health Potion
major_health_potion.description: A large vial of crimson liquid that provides significant healing when consumed.
major_health_potion.effect_description: The potent potion warms your body as it rapidly heals your injuries.

minor_mana_potion.name: Minor Mana Potion
minor_mana_potion.description: A small vial of blue liquid that restores magical energy when consumed.
minor_mana_potion.effect_description: The potion tingles with arcane energy as it restores your magical power.

major_mana_potion.name: Major Mana Potion
major_mana_potion.description: A large vial of glowing blue liquid that significantly restores magical energy.
major_mana_potion.effect_description: The powerful potion surges with magical energy, greatly restoring your mana.

rations.name: Travel Rations
rations.description: A day's worth of preserved food and water. Provides sustenance for long journeys.
rations.effect_description: The simple meal helps restore your strength and energy.

herbal_remedy.name: Herbal Remedy
herbal_remedy.description: A mixture of healing herbs that provides both physical and mental restoration.
herbal_remedy.effect_description: The herbal mixture tastes earthy but leaves you feeling refreshed and focused.
